trans-unit.source: Defines a contract that components can use to access information about an event across application domain and process boundaries.
trans-unit.target: Define um contrato que os componentes podem usar para acessar informações sobre um evento entre o domínio do aplicativo e os limites do processo.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract> provides information about an event of a remote object that implements the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract> interface.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract> fornece informações sobre um evento de um objeto remoto que implementa o <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract> interface.

trans-unit.source: To access one or more events of a remote object, use the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract.GetRemoteType%2A> method to get an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract> that represents the type of the remote object.
trans-unit.target: Para acessar um ou mais eventos de um objeto remoto, use o <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract.GetRemoteType%2A> método para obter um <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract> que representa o tipo do objeto remoto.
Em seguida, chame o <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract.GetEvent%2A> ou <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract.GetEvents%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Returns the method that was used to add an event handler delegate to the event that this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract" /> identifies.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o método que foi usado para adicionar um delegado de manipulador de eventos ao evento que esse <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract" /> identifica.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract" /> that represents the method that was used to add an event handler delegate to the event that this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract" /> identifies.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract" /> que representa o método que foi usado para adicionar um delegado de manipulador de eventos ao evento que esse <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract" /> identifica.

trans-unit.source: To add a delegate to the event, call the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A> method of the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract> that <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract.GetAddMethod%2A> returns.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar um delegado para o evento, chame o <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A> método o <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract> que <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract.GetAddMethod%2A> retorna.

trans-unit.source: Pass an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract> that represents the delegate into the `parameters` parameter of <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Passar um <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract> que representa o representante para a `parameters` parâmetro <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the event that this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract" /> identifies.
trans-unit.target: Retorna informações sobre o evento que este <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract" /> identifica.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteMemberData" /> that provides information about the event that this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract" /> identifies.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteMemberData" /> que fornece informações sobre o evento que este <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract" /> identifica.

trans-unit.source: The information provided by the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteMemberData> structure includes the name of the event and the type that declares the event.
trans-unit.target: As informações fornecidas pelo <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteMemberData> estrutura inclui o nome do evento e o tipo que declara o evento.

trans-unit.source: Returns the method that was used to remove an event handler delegate from the event that this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract" /> identifies.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o método que foi usado para remover um delegado de manipulador de eventos do evento que esse <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract" /> identifica.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract" /> that represents the method that was used to remove an event handler delegate from the event that this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract" /> identifies.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract" /> que representa o método que foi usado para remover um delegado de manipulador de eventos do evento que esse <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract" /> identifica.

trans-unit.source: To remove a delegate from the event, call the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A> method of the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract> that <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract.GetRemoveMethod%2A> returns.
trans-unit.target: Para remover um delegado do evento, chame o <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A> método o <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract> que <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract.GetRemoveMethod%2A> retorna.

trans-unit.source: Pass an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract> that represents the delegate into the `parameters` parameter of <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Passar um <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract> que representa o representante para a `parameters` parâmetro <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>.
